name: Ea Elemental Affinity Charm III
description:
Ea, also known as Zephyr, is the element of the storm; air and lightning. It can decrease a target's movement speed, but no known creature is directly vulnerable to it.

Fuse together 5 charms of the same level to obtain a charm of the next highest level.

Charms can be placed into items with sockets, but the total level of all of the charms cannot exceed the level of the item.
